args.natural_language_statement: Prove that a group of order 200 has a normal Sylow 5-subgroup.

retrieved_examples.nl: Show that a group of order 21 has a normal Sylow 7-subgroup.
retrieved_examples.lean:
import Mathlib

theorem group_of_order_21_has_normal_sylow_7 {G : Type*} [Group G] [Fintype G] (h : Fintype.card G = 21) :
  ∃! H : Subgroup G, Fintype.card H = 7 := by sorry

retrieved_examples.nl: Prove that a finite group of order p^2 q has a unique Sylow p-subgroup (p and q primes, p<q).
retrieved_examples.lean:
import Mathlib

theorem unique_sylow_p_of_order_p2q {G : Type*} [Group G] [Fintype G] {p q : Nat} (hp : ¬ (p = q)) (h : Fintype.card G = p^2 * q) :
  ∃! H : Subgroup G, Fintype.card H = p^2 := by sorry

args.content:
import Mathlib
open MulAction Subgroup
open Pointwise

/-- Prove that a group of order 200 has a normal Sylow 5-subgroup. -/
theorem normal_sylow_5_of_order_200 {G : Type*} [Group G] [Fintype G] (h : Fintype.card G = 200) :
  ∃! H : Subgroup G, Fintype.card H = 5 := by sorry
